title: Galaxy v28n06 (August 1969) (Modified)
creator: Galaxy Publishing Corporation
description: The writings of Lester Del Rey have been removed due to a request by John Betancourt of Wildside Press. Note: The novel "The White King's War" by Poul Anderson has been removed from this online copy at the request of the estate of Poul Anderson. Bertram Chandler Serial: Dune Messiah (Part 2 of 5) by Frank Herbert Short Stories: When They Openly Walk by Fritz Leiber Life Matter by Bruce McAllister I Am Crying All Inside by Clifford D.
